name: Valerie Rodriguez
text: Wonderful Facility! Great coaches work hard to develop young people into great ball players!

text: Good place for kids to learn

name: Stephen Michael
text: Not bad

name: Ranzie Johnson
text: Annie is an absolutely wonderful batting Coach, she explains things in a way that connects to the girls.   My daughter takes batting lessons, but I've also saw her giving pitching lessons as well.  The parents have said they are happy with their lessons.

name: Kristen Hipolito
text: Love this place and the coaches are fantastic!

name: Shelley Beery
text: My son played soccer for Coach Annie several years ago and now my daughter trains with her in hopes to play soccer in college. Annie is fantastic and runs a great facility

name: Hallie Keel
text: Wonderful facility and dedicated instructors!

name: Jaci Wallace
text: We played glow in the dark Wiffle ball and it was really fun

name: Donna Sawyer
text: Great training facility!

name: Rickey Moran
text: Great service and is awesome place to shop.

name: Chris Jordan
text: Everything you want a hometown sports store be.

name: Jason Norris
text: Great local store with awesome customer service.

name: Janet Sanders
text: I love the entire staff. Everyone has always been so helpful. Even when I am unsure of what to order for my business they always seem to know exactly what I need. I will always be a repeat customer.

name: William Burkett
text: Always a great experience!

name: Glenn Koehler
text: I'm so glad you guys are back and going strong, the city missed you! As the buzz continued around the city from church to school and even in local stores once you guys opened back up the buzz really began to sing, Friendly, local home feel and always willing to help in anyway they can, prices are reasonable and worth every penny!

name: Robert Mashburn
text: Great hometown sporting goods store. Friendliest service you could ever hope for.

name: K
text: Great family owned store. We got everything we needed for the softball season.

name: Scott Holmes
text: Great place,  great service.  It's not big but stop here first!

name: Renee Brown
text: Great staff love them 🎉

name: Jerry Oddo
text: Very helpful and pleasant staff

name: Christopher Smith
text: Awesome staff

name: Kenneth Kerns
text: Looking for individualized training for softball skills, then you have come to the right place. Excellent coaching and facilities. Batting cages and lanes available for individuals, groups or teams. Instructors very skilled in catching and hitting skills

name: Josh Masingille
text: This is so cool. The kids baseball team can practice indoors out of the cold and the heat of summer.

name: Jamaal Williams
text: Best organization for pitching lessons. Ricky is the man

name: Jeff Craver
text: Premier baseball facility and coaching.

name: Gary Phillips
text: Great teachers of baseball,and all guys working with boys make it kinda like family for boys.  There website tells what kinda experience these boys gain as looking at there scholarship section from past players. Awesome all way around

name: Marshall Smith
text: Love this place. The coaching that your kids receive here is hands down the best.

name: chris moore
text: They take the training seriously and do a great job at it. Highly recommended

name: Robert Davis
text: Wonderful staff best place in North Alabama for baseball lessons

name: wade harris
text: Very knowledgeable instructors and very good with developing players

name: Neal Hargrove
text: Nice complex for baseball and softball. Good facilities and concession stand. The grounds were well kept and all student staff were friendly and helpful..

name: Evil Eyes
text: This place has really declined over the years. Unless your here for team sports specifically I wouldn't bother. The playgrounds are old falling apart, and ignored. Ever since uah bought this place there is barely any parking to speak of on the public side, then again you'll be lucky if the gates are open.

name: Kumarappan Ganesh
text: Nice place which has soccer, baseball, softball and lacrosse fields

name: Laura Whitfield
text: Very nice facility!

name: John Taylor
text: great facility.
